snippet: A jury in Akron convicted a self-styled street preacher on Tuesday in a deadly plot to lure men with Craigslist job offers and then rob them.
abstract: Jury in Akron, Ohio, convicts Richard Beasley in deadly plot to lure men with Craigslist job offers and then rob them; finds Beasley guilty of aggravated murder in deaths of two men.
lead_paragraph: A jury in Akron convicted a self-styled street preacher on Tuesday in a deadly plot to lure men with Craigslist job offers and then rob them.

headline.main: Ohio: Murder Verdict in Craigslist Killings
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Murder Verdict In Craigslist Killings
